targets.sql: select last(sys_cpu_cores) as cpus from $database.taosx_sys
select last(sys_total_memory)/(1024*1024*1024) from $database.taosx_sys
select last(uptime)as seconds from $database.taosx_sys  where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_cpu_percent)  from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_memory_percent) as memory from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, avg(process_cpu_percent) as cpu_usage from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(process_memory_percent) as memory_usage from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(running_tasks) as running_tasks from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(failed_tasks_in_24h) as failed_tasks_in_24h from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(complete_tasks_in_24h) as complete_tasks_in_24h from $database.taosx_sys where taosx_id = '$taosX_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select last(sys_cpu_cores) as cpus from $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(sys_total_memory)/(1024*1024*1024) from $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(uptime)as seconds from  $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_cpu_percent)  from $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select last(process_memory_percent) as memory from $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
select _wstart as ts, avg(process_cpu_percent) as cpu_usage  from $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id'  and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select _wstart as ts, avg(process_memory_percent) as memory_usage from $database.taosx_agent where agent_id = '$agent_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to interval(30s) fill(null)
select task_id, last(execute_time) as uptime, last(written_rows) as written_rows  from $database.taosx_task_opc  where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(rows_per_second) as rows_per_second from $database.taosx_task_opc where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(points_per_second) as points_per_second from $database.taosx_task_opc where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(processed_batches) as processed_batches from $database.taosx_task_opc where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(processed_batches) as processed_batches from $database.taosx_task_opc where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(failed_sqls) as failed_sqls from $database.taosx_task_opc where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id
select task_id, last(execute_time) as uptime, last(written_rows) as written_rows  from $database.taosx_task_mqtt  where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(rows_per_second) as rows_per_second from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(points_per_second) as points_per_second from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(processed_batches) as processed_batches from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(processed_batches) as processed_batches from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and  _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(failed_sqls) as failed_sqls from $database.taosx_task_mqtt where ('$task' = '' OR task_id = '$task') and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id
select task_id, last(execute_time) as uptime, last(written_rows) as written_rows  from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3  where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(rows_per_second) as rows_per_second from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(points_per_second) as points_per_second from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

select _wstart as ts, task_id,  avg(write_raw_fails) as write_raw_fails from $database.taosx_task_tdengine3 where _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to  partition by task_id  interval($interval) fill(null) order by task_id

list.definition: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null
list.label: Log from
list.name: database
list.query: select name from information_schema.ins_databases where `vgroups` is not null

list.definition: select distinct(agent_id) from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to
list.label: Agent
list.name: agent_id
list.query: select distinct(agent_id) from $database.taosx_agent where taosx_id = '$taosX_id' and _ts >= $from and _ts <= $to

list.definition:
SELECT 'TDengine2' AS datasource  UNION  SELECT 'TDengine3' UNION  SELECT 'Influxdb'UNION  SELECT 'Opentsdb'UNION  SELECT 'OPC'UNION  SELECT 'PI'UNION  SELECT 'CSV'UNION  SELECT 'MQTT'UNION
 SELECT 'Hisotorian'UNION  SELECT 'Kafka' order by datasource
list.label: DataSource
list.name: datasource
list.query:
SELECT 'TDengine2' AS datasource  UNION  SELECT 'TDengine3' UNION  SELECT 'Influxdb'UNION  SELECT 'Opentsdb'UNION  SELECT 'OPC'UNION  SELECT 'PI'UNION  SELECT 'CSV'UNION  SELECT 'MQTT'UNION
 SELECT 'Hisotorian'UNION  SELECT 'Kafka' order by datasource
